text: The 2017 Little Rock Trojans baseball team represents the University of Arkansas at Little Rock in the 2017 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Trojans play their home games at Gary Hogan Field. ==Schedule and results== Little Rock Trojans announced its 2017 football schedule on October 24, 2016. The 2017 schedule consists of 28 home and 27 away games in the regular season. The Trojans will host Sun Belts foes Appalachian State, Georgia State, Louisiana, Texas State, and Troy and will travel to Arkansas State, Georgia Southern, Louisiana–Monroe, South Alabama, and Texas-Arlington. The 2017 Sun Belt Conference Championship will be contested May 24–28 in Statesboro, Georgia, and will be hosted by Georgia Southern. {| class="toccolours" width=73% style="both; text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=2 style="" | 2017 Little Rock Trojans Baseball Game Log |- ! colspan=2 style="" | Regular Season (0–3) |- valign="top" | {| class="wikitable collapsed" style="margin:auto; width:100%; text-align:left; font-size:95%" ! colspan=12 style="padding- left:4em;" | February (0–3) |- !
